create_token = '64b85ab747f13b6', create_booking = 608

    @allure.title("Test that partia update working with PATCH for first name and Last name")
    @pytest.mark.integration
    def test_update_name_with_patch(create_token,create_booking):
        base_url = "https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com"
        base_path = "/booking/" + str(create_booking)
        PATCH_URL = base_url + base_path
        cookie = "token=" + create_token
        headers = {
            "Content-Type": "application / json",
            "Cookie": cookie
        }
        patch_payload = {
            "firstname": "John"
        }
    
        patch_response = requests.patch(url=PATCH_URL, headers=headers, json=patch_payload)
        assert patch_response.status_code == 200
    
        patched_data = patch_response.json()
        firstname = patched_data["firstname"]
        lastname = patched_data["lastname"]
